scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV='development' cross-env PORT='3009' ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register index
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV='test' cross-env PORT='3010' cross-env LOGGER_LEVEL='warn' ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register index
scripts.error: cross-env NODE_ENV='test' cross-env PORT='3010' cross-env LOGGER_LEVEL='error' cross-env LOGGER_ENABLED='xyz' ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register index
